00007  *  An Object of the dialog controls that can be selected and maybe manipulated

00010 #include "CDlgObject.h"
00011 #include "../graphics/CFont.h"
00012 #include "../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00013 #include "../sdl/video/colourconvert.h"
00014 
00015 CDlgObject::CDlgObject() :
00016 m_Option(NULL),
00017 m_selectable(false),
00018 m_selected(false),
00019 m_colour(0x0)
00020 { }
00021 
00022 ///
00023 // Creation Routine
00024 ///
00025 void CDlgObject::create(Uint8 type, Uint16 ID, Uint16 x, Uint16 y,
00026   const std::string &text, unsigned int delimiter, Uint8 Fontmap_ID, Uint8 theme)
00027 {
00028  m_type = type;
00029  m_ID = ID;
00030  m_theme = theme;
00031  
00032  m_x = x;
00033  m_y = y;
00034  
00035  if( m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT || m_type == DLG_OBJ_DISABLED || m_type == DLG_OBJ_TEXT )
00036  {
00037   m_selectable = (m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT) ? true : false;
00038   m_Option = new CDlgOptionText(text, delimiter, Fontmap_ID);
00039  }
00040 }
00041 
00042 void CDlgObject::change(unsigned int delimiter, const std::string &text, Uint8 type)
00043 {
00044  m_type = type;
00045  if( m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT || m_type == DLG_OBJ_DISABLED)
00046  {
00047   m_selectable = (m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT) ? true : false;
00048   m_Option->setText(text, delimiter);
00049  }
00050  else if( m_type == DLG_OBJ_TEXT )
00051  {
00052   m_selectable = false;
00053   m_Option->setText(text, delimiter+4);
00054  }
00055 }
00056 
00057 ///
00058 // Property change routine
00059 ///
00060 // Will this item get selected or not?
00061 void CDlgObject::setSelection(bool value)
00062 {
00063  m_selected = value;
00064 }
00065 
00066 ///
00067 // Rendering Routine
00068 ///
00069 const Uint8 fade_speed = 0xA;
00070 void CDlgObject::render(SDL_Surface *dst, Uint8 scrollamt, bool highlight)
00071 {
00072  if(m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT)
00073  {
00074   Uint32 colourdir;
00075 
00076   if(m_theme == DLG_THEME_GALAXY)
00077    colourdir = m_selected ? 0x54fc54 : 0x208c20;
00078   else
00079    colourdir = m_selected ? 0x0000FF : 0x000000;
00080 
00081   if(g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig() && g_pVideoDriver->getDepth() >= 24) // Nice colour effect applied here
00082    fadetoColour(m_colour, colourdir, fade_speed);
00083   else
00084    m_colour = colourdir;
00085 
00086   m_Option->draw(dst, m_x+16, m_y-8*scrollamt, highlight, m_colour);
00087  }
00088  else if(m_type == DLG_OBJ_DISABLED)
00089   m_Option->draw(dst, m_x+16, m_y-8*scrollamt, highlight, (m_theme == DLG_THEME_GALAXY) ? 0x6E906E : 0x7F7F7F ); // +16 because selection icon needs space
00090  else if(m_type == DLG_OBJ_TEXT)
00091   m_Option->draw(dst, m_x, m_y-8*scrollamt, true);
00092 }
00093 
00094 ///
00095 // Erase Routine
00096 ///
00097 CDlgObject::~CDlgObject(){
00098  if( m_type == DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT || m_type == DLG_OBJ_DISABLED || m_type == DLG_OBJ_TEXT )
00099  {
00100   if(m_Option) delete m_Option;
00101  }
00102 }
